I must adjust the tube in your chest.

I must give you a suppository into your rectum.
I must give you an injection with a needle.
Put your arms around my shoulders.
This medicine will take the pain away.
'edna 'ajiz: haTha id duwa raH yewaKher il wija'

We have a malfunction: This will help you feel better.
Everything will be done to make you feel better again.
'edna 'ajiz: raH inHaawil insawee kul shee 'alamood itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: رَح نحاول نسوي كل شي علمود تصير زين

We have a malfunction: You will soon be up again.
Your condition is serious, but you will get better.
'edna 'ajiz: Haaltak KhaTra bas raH itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: حالتَك خطرة بس رَح تصير زين

We have a malfunction: You will get better if you let us take care of you.
'edna 'ajiz: iTha itKhaleena in'aaljak raH itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: إذا تخلينا نعالجك رح تصير زين

We have a malfunction: It will probably take a long time for you to get better.
'edna 'ajiz: tiHtaaj wakit Taweel Hata itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: تِحتاج وَكت طويل حتى تصير زين

We have a malfunction: We were able to help you.
We tried, but we could not save this
'edna 'ajiz: Haawelna bas ma gederna inbaqee haTha

We have a malfunction: You will need time to heal.
We will arrange for your transport back to your country.
'edna 'ajiz: raH inratib umoor rujoo'ak il baladak

We have a malfunction: We will send you to another place.
You will return to your unit when you are better.
'edna 'ajiz: raH tirja' il waHedtak min itSeer zayn
عدنا عجز: رَح ترَجع لوِحِدتَك مِن تصير زين

We have a malfunction: I will check back later to see how you are doing.
'edna 'ajiz: raH arja' mart luKh Hata ashoof shlon Sirit
عدنا عجز: رَح أرجع مرّة لُخ حتى أشوف شلون صرت

We have a malfunction: Return tomorrow so we can be sure you get better.
'edna 'ajiz: ta'aal baachir Hata nit-akad Sirit zayn
عدنا عجز: تعال باچِر حتى نتاكد صرت زين

We have a malfunction: Return in one week so we can be sure you get better.
'edna 'ajiz: ta'aal wara isboo' Hata nit-akad Sirit zayn
عدنا عجز: تعال وره إسبوع حتى نتاكد صرت زين

We have a malfunction: Do you have any of the following problems?
'edna 'ajiz: 'indak ay mushkila min hay il mashakil?
عدنا عجز: عندك أي مشكلة من هاي المشاكل؟

We have a malfunction: I need to give you some medicine

'edna 'ajiz: haTha il duwa raH yemna' il iltihaab
itjaneb il mashroobaat min taKhuTh il duwa

We have a malfunction: Take on an empty stomach (one hour before or two hours after a meal)
'edna 'ajiz: uKhuTh il duwa min itkoon baTnak fargha gabul saa'a lo ba'ad il akel ibsa'teen
عدنا عجز: أخذ الدوا من تكون بطنك فارغة گبل ساعة لو بعد الأكل بساعتين

We have a malfunction: Avoid taking at the same time as dairy products
'edna 'ajiz: itjaneb taKhuTh ibnafs il waqt mantoojaat il Haleeb
عدنا عجز: إتجنب تاخذ بنفس الوقت منتوجات الحليب

We have a malfunction: This medicine may change the color of urine or stool.
'edna 'ajiz: haTha il duwa yemken yeghayir lon il bol aw il Khurooj
عدنا عجز: هذا الدوا يمكن يغير لون البول أو الخروج

We have a malfunction: May cause drowsiness (avoid using dangerous machinery)
'edna 'ajiz: yemken yesabib doKha (itjaneb il 'amel bil makayeen)
Khalee qaTraat bil- eThin il moSaaba

We have a malfunction: Unwrap and insert one suppository rectally
'edna 'ajiz: iftaH ghelaaf il fiteela wodaKhelha bil sharij

We have a malfunction: Allow to dissolve under tongue without swallowing (sublingual)
'edna 'ajiz: la-tibl'a Khalee yemoo' jawa il lisaan
عدنا عجز: لا تبلعه خلي يموع جوه اللسان

'edna 'ajiz: iz'aaj bil me'da, wol'baan il nafas, wozwaa'
noba fojaa-eeya teDhrub 'al galub aw il damaagh
عدنا عجز: نوبة فجائية تضرب عل الگلب أو الدماغ

We have a malfunction: Apply a thin layer to skin
Do you have any of the following diseases?

'edna 'ajiz: il Huma ilee tishbah il teefo-eed

We have a malfunction: Here is a copy of our ground rules.
Sign here if you agree to follow the ground rules.
'edna 'ajiz: waqi' ihnaa iTha itwaafiq mutaaba'at shorooTna il-asaasiya

We have a malfunction: This is not the public affairs office.

She does not wish to give an interview.
Do not take photos of this place.
Do not take videos of this place.

عدنا عجز: ممنوع تاخذ فيديو هالجزء من الجهاز

We have a malfunction: You cannot enter this area now.

We have a malfunction: We do not discuss personnel or equipment strength with the media.
